attention1.ptxt: This transfer has a center differential.

When testing with 2-wheel chassis dynamometer or speedometer tester (which tester roller is driven by vehicle wheels), be sure to make the vehicle as rear wheel drive or as front wheel drive temporarily as follows.
Otherwise, front wheels drive rear wheels or vise-versa and personal injury may result.

s1.ptxt: Remove front propeller shaft or rear propeller shaft referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Install special tool (cap) to flange yoke cover hole (front or rear) of transfer (1) and fix it to transfer or hook with string to prevent oil leakage from transfer.
Pour specified oil into transfer up to lever plug hole if front propeller shaft is removed.
Shift transfer to 4H-lock position as follows.

item.ptxt: Remove lever bolt (1) on transfer, push down lever to 4H-lock position (2) and fix lever with bolt.
Shift transfer to 4H-lock position by turning transfer switch.
